2025-12-19PMODepartment of Justice ActAppointment of the Deputy Minister of Justice and Deputy Attorney General of CanadaAppointment of the Honourable Marie-Josée Hogue of Montréal, Quebec, to be Deputy Minister of Justice and Deputy Attorney General of Canada, to hold office during pleasure, effective February 2, 2026.N/A
subject: Appointment of the Deputy Minister of Justice and Deputy Attorney General of Canada
precis: Appointment of the Honourable Marie-Josée Hogue of Montréal, Quebec, to be Deputy Minister of Justice and Deputy Attorney General of Canada, to hold office during pleasure, effective February 2, 2026.
